author: Conner Benson
comment: It's fun it gives everything a cool Star Wars overhaul I have had a lot of fun messing with the selfies feature and now I have a use for my General Mills QR codes. My favorite aspect is the weather. I live in a cold place so it says I am on Hoth. And it would be a good day to stay inside. Haha I agree!

author: Christel Reukers
comment: I was able to use this once to add some stickers to a pic, which I think looked great! But now it keeps crashing, ironically every time it asks me to rate the app. So fine, I will rate it: pretty looking app, very unstable! Useless after first use, because of popups that crash the app.

reply.author: Disney
reply.content: Hello there. Thanks for your feedback. Please check that you are connected to wifi and have the most current version of the app.  Our recent updates addressed a few bugs.  If that does not resolve your issue, we encourage you to teach out to support directly and provide more information so they can further investigate.  May the Force be with you.

author: kate alley
comment: It's got a lot of Star Wars trivia built into it, so that makes it worth right there! I love the weather app and how it will compare the weather/temperature to a planet in the Star Wars universe. The only thing that has disappointed me, is that to unlock certain features, you have to scan the movie posters, which I don't have access to.

author: Tristan Pearson
comment: It's simple, easy to use, and provides a great database on all Star Wars related media. Plus, the activities and mini-games are fun to play.

author: Robert Skimin
comment: A lot of the functions do not work. The Force trainer was fun, but it doesn't work anymore. And the Stickers cause a fatal error every time.

author: Abdiel Reyes
comment: I love this app alot cause it tells u the weather but In different planets in starwars! And also u can have fun playing with starwars voices.

comment: It's Star Wars what else do I gotta say download it
